sub_title: Communications, Media & Culture Graduate 2021 || Media Enthusiast || Global Citizen
summary:
👋   Hi! I'm Annika (she/her), I am a Communications, Media and Culture graduate with Class 2:1 degree from Oxford Brookes University in England. 

🌍   I am a global citizen. 
During my secondary education, due to my father’s job, I have moved country 5 times living in the UK, Germany, Turkey, UAE and now the Netherlands. With each international move I have had to learn how to adapt to new cultures, languages, meet new people and make new friends. I believe this adaptability I have developed over the last 15 years has helped nurture my interpersonal and communication skills.

profile_positions.description:
During my time as a Campaign Manager, I had the privilege of acquiring a diverse skill set that has not only deepened my understanding of digital marketing but also equipped me with valuable tools to drive successful campaigns. This role meant that after my internship, I was mainly responsible for clients from Germany and Austria.

➤ Campaign Strategy: I developed a keen sense of crafting effective campaigns tailored to specific objectives and target audiences. This involved defining clear goals and creating a roadmap for success, i.e a student becoming enrolled by our university clients. 

➤ Campaign Optimisation: I developed an approach for working with my team, identifying areas of improvement within campaigns and implementing changes to enhance performance. Continuous optimisation was critical for achieving better results.

➤ Creative Content: I discovered the importance of compelling and relevant content in engaging the audience. From Banners, Newsletters, and other eye-catching visuals, I learned to create content that resonates with the target audience.

➤ Reporting and Insights: To me it was a priority to become proficient in generating comprehensive campaign reports, highlighting key performance indicators, and providing actionable insights to our clients for informed decision-making.

➤ Collaboration: Working closely with cross-functional teams and regular meetings with clients, I realised the significance of effective communication and collaboration

I'm excited to apply these skills in future endeavors and contribute to the success of marketing campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Campaign Manager

profile_positions.description:
➤ I was trained in leveraging analytics tools to monitor and analyze campaign performance. Understanding metrics like click-through rates, conversion rates, and ROI allowed me to make data-driven decisions and optimize campaigns in real time.

➤ Digital Advertising: I gained hands-on experience with various advertising platforms, including Google Ads. I learned how to create, manage, and optimize ad campaigns, and allocate budgets effectively. 

➤ A/B Testing: Experiment with different lead variations and strategies to determine which ones perform best, helping optimize campaign performance for both the company and the clients.

➤ Teamwork: Collaborating with colleagues to ensure their campaigns are being monitored on a daily basis. Whilst also developed problem-solving skills and how to address issues and keep campaigns on track.
profile_positions.title: Campaign Manager Intern

profile_positions.description:
➤ Customer Service: Accommodating customers, ensuring that their experience at the establishment has been complimentary and pleasant. 

➤ Time Management: Demonstrated ability to efficiently juggle multiple tasks, prioritize responsibilities, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.

➤ Adaptability: Highly adaptable, capable of handling unforeseen challenges with poise and finding creative solutions on the go.

➤ Attention to Detail: Meticulous in maintaining cleanliness, ensuring order accuracy, and upholding a professional appearance.

➤ Multilingual Proficiency: Fluent in English and German, facilitating effective communication with diverse clientele.

➤ Social Media Marketing: Managing the Facebook and Instagram pages and creating eye-catching content for the targeted audience, which resulted in increased engagement with customers.

➤ Employee Supervisor: Leading by example, I personally try to nurture a culture of teamwork among front-line staff, empowering them to excel in their roles. Trusted to train new employees.
profile_positions.title: Front of House Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
➤ Effective Communication: Proficient in conveying information clearly and confidently to diverse audiences, through organised events such as Freshers Week, World Mental Health Week, and Budgeting Money.

➤ Leadership: Demonstrated leadership qualities, including initiative, responsibility, and the ability to inspire and motivate fellow student ambassadors.

➤ Time Management: Proven ability to balance academic responsibilities with ambassadorial duties, meeting commitments and deadlines effectively.

➤ Cultural Sensitivity: Respectful of cultural differences and committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse campus community.
profile_positions.title: Student Ambassador

profile_positions.description:
➤ Curriculum Support: Assisting teachers in delivering curriculum content, preparing teaching materials, and maintaining a structured learning environment.

➤ Creative Engagement: Adept at developing and implementing age-appropriate, creative, and play-based learning activities that ignite curiosity and foster development.

➤ Child-Centric Approach: Proficient in understanding and catering to the unique needs, interests, and learning styles of preschool-aged children.

➤ Enthusiasm: Genuinely passionate about early childhood education, creating a positive and joyful atmosphere that encourages learning through exploration.

➤ Collaboration: Collaborating with fellow teaching assistants and educators to create a harmonious and supportive nursery community.
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description:
➤ Content Creation: Proficient in creating captivating multimedia content, from persuasive ad copy to eye-catching visuals, to effectively convey brand messages.

➤ Market Research: Proficient in market research and competitor analysis to identify trends, opportunities, the rise of influencers and areas for strategic improvement.

➤ Social Media Management: Skilled in curating and scheduling engaging social media content, fostering brand awareness, and driving audience engagement.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern
